definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: Little boat with short oar drifts, where he doesn't know after wake.
sentences.chinese: 輕舟短棹任橫斜，醒後不知何處。

sentences.english: Horizontal inclined piccolo heartily Be taking captive the pleasant breeze of April.
sentences.chinese: 橫斜的短笛盡情在擄掠四月的清風。
